meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with tools or mechanical devices.
meanings.sent1: The toolhead spent hours organizing his toolbox.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor is a toolhead who loves fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent3: The toolhead tried to fix his broken phone with a hammer - not the best idea!
meanings.sent4: She was a toolhead when it came to gardening, always using the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The toolhead's eyes sparkled with excitement as he entered the hardware store.

meanings.definition: A derogatory term for someone who is perceived as unintelligent or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Don't be a toolhead and make silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He was called a toolhead for forgetting his keys again.
meanings.sent3: The toolhead thought the moon was made of cheese - how silly!
meanings.sent4: She felt like a toolhead after realizing she had been using the wrong password all along.
meanings.sent5: Being a toolhead in class, he always asked questions that had obvious answers.
